title: Penne O Penne Lyrics Naan Sigappu Manithan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Â Penne O Penne
Singer: Vandhana Srinivasan & AI-Rufian
Music: GV Prakash
Movie: Naan sigappu manithan

Un aasai Kadhil Sonnaal niraivettruven
unakkaaga veiyilai kooda mazhaiyaakkuven
un peyarai solli solli
udhadugal thaeindhadhai
unakkindru yaar solvadhu.

Penne o penne
ivan asaigal ellaam eliyavaithaaney
Penne o penne
nee kettaa podhum

Penne o penne
ivan thevaigal ellaam therinjavai thaaney
Penne o penne
ondraai ovvondraai nee thandhaa podhum

Nee pillai pole thoonga
endhan thozhil naanum thottil seiven.
Anbaal thollai seidhu
unnai adimai seiven.

Nee kaattil pooththa poodhaan
veli potu unnai kaaval seiven
kaattrum unnai thottaal
udaney kaidhu seiven.

Unmele paithiyamaanen
thazhaikeelaai maariponen
un paarvai theendum podhu
kannaadi pole udaindheney.

Penne o penne
ivan asaigal ellaam eliyavaithaaney
Penne o penne
nee kettaa podhum

Penne o penne
ivan thevaigal ellaam therinjavai thaaney
Penne o penne
ondraai ovvondraai nee thandhaa podhum

Adi yedho puriyaa aasai
nenjin oram vandhu pookkal neetta.
Ennai enakke kadhal
ada da da pudhidhaai kaatta.

Ival yaaro yaaro endru
kadhin oram oru kelvi vaatta.
endhan paadhi endre
naanum unnai kaatta.

Engae nee irundhaai penne
eppadi ne enakkul vandhaai
un naale urakkam kettu
thannaale naanum ezhundheney.

Penne o penne
ivan asaigal ellaam eliyavaithaaney
Penne o penne
nee kettaa podhum

Penne o penne
ivan thevaigal ellaam therinjavai thaaney
Penne o penne
ondraai ovvondraai nee thandhaa podhum
